description: Detects enumeration of local network configuration Author: Ömer Günal and remotephone, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: System Network Discovery - Linux
query: (process.executable:(*\/firewall\-cmd OR *\/ufw OR *\/iptables OR *\/netstat OR *\/ss OR *\/ip OR *\/ifconfig OR *\/systemd\-resolve OR *\/route) OR process.command_line:*\/etc\/resolv.conf*)
